verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: accused] [ARG1: The New York Times] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG2: of inventing a source for a story who , in fact , was a White House official]
Trump accused [ARG0: The New York Times] on Saturday of [V: inventing] [ARG1: a source for a story who , in fact , was a White House official]
Trump accused The New York Times on Saturday of inventing a source for [ARG1: a story] [R-ARG1: who] , [ARGM-ADV: in fact] , [V: was] [ARG2: a White House official]
